thread.title: Manchester City: The Greatest Team in Premier League History?

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Manchester City: The Greatest Team in Premier League History?
text:
LONDON—Manchester City’s dominance of the English Premier League was so complete this season that it stretched until the final kick of the final game.
In the 94th minute on Sunday, with the score tied at 0-0, striker Gabriel Jesus sprinted past Southampton’s back line and deftly lobbed the ball over the goalkeeper to seal a 1-0 victory. The sound of the final whistle was lost amid the din of City’s celebrations.
